markdownRemark.html:
This is my first post, so let me introduce about this site and myself first.

About OTQ Studio

OTQ Studio is a portfolio and blog site. I’ll write about my dairy life, especially about crafting digital contents including web apps, web sites, photography, illustrations and so on.

This site has three purposes: One is to gather people who are willing to join my β version projects. Second is to post informations in more detail about OTQ for people who get interested in me. Third is to develop my English writing skill.

About me

1. My handle - OTQ

My handle in the Internet is OTQ. My real name is Yuki SHIBUYA. I usually use handle in the internet.

Why use the handle? - Why OTQ?

I think it’s hard for some people to remember person’s name. My name is Japanese name, so I don’t have confident that visitors can remember my real name. I think short and unique name is better. That’s why I use the handle.

2. My country

I was born in Kyoto of Japan. I’ll write my hometown in other article with a lot of beautiful photos.

3. My background

  • 2018-3 Graduation from Kcufs.
  • 2018-3 Start a business.
  • 2019-5 Release ULOCO.

I used to be a student in the Kobe City University for Foreign Studies. While at university, I wanted to live off someday by creating a service on my own, which services has to be well known and used all over the world.

After graduation, I start a business as a web production, and sometimes work as a web designer. However I realized that I don’t have an aptitude for web designer at all. So I start to work at one warehouse two days in a week for living, and I work hard for my productions in days left.

My immediate goals

1. To get 10 OTQ subscribers.

I wanna gather 10 OTQ subscribers at least, who are willing to join my β version projects. This is my first purpose of managing this site. I’ll explain about OTQ subscribers in other article.

2. To release a new service. (I’m developing now)

I’m developing a new service now. Releasing it is one of my immediate goals. I’m studying hard now to compensate the lack of knowledges and skills. I’m still unsure about a lot of things but I’ll do my best.

Follow me!

If you get interested in me and wanna cheer me, please follow my SNS accounts!

  • Facebook Page(@OTQStudio)
  • Main Twitter:(@OTQStudio in EN)
  • Sub Twitter: (@uotomiz in JP)
  • (Extra) Instagram: (@otq.studio) ← my dairy photography
